meanings.definition: To remove a methyl group from a molecule.
meanings.sent1: Scientists demethylate the compound to study its effects on cells.
meanings.sent2: It is important to demethylate the substance before conducting further experiments.
meanings.sent3: Why did the molecule go to therapy? To demethylate and feel lighter!
meanings.sent4: Removing the methyl group was like peeling off a stubborn sticker from the molecule.
meanings.sent5: The process of demethylating can reveal hidden properties of the compound.
